thread.section_title: The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely boutique Hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely boutique Hotel - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: KFaws
title: Lovely boutique Hotel
text:
This charming small hotel is conveniently located close to Paddington Station and Hyde Park. The staff are very attentive and helpful. My room was extremely comfortable and clean with a lovely marble bathroom. I had supper in their cozy bar area and while it was a bit on the pricey side, the food and service were top notch. After a day of walking around London, it was very nice to be able to have a light supper in the hotel. As a woman travelling alone, I felt completely at ease in this Hotel. I would definitely consider staying here again.
Room Tip: Ground level room near the kitchen may be a problem if you like to sleep in. See more room tips
